review:
This is a summary of multiple visits over the course of about 6 months.

I visited the clinic on the recommendation of my cousin brother who is also a dentist (in a different city), and now I would recommend
everyone to choose Ivory Smiles for any of your dental needs.

Dr. Amruta is extremely approachable & takes good care of her patients. She will take the time to understand your case, is sensitive to your needs & succinctly explains the process. She has a great bedside manner and ensures you are comfortable during any procedures you may get.

My treatment:
I have a congenitally missing maxillary lateral incisor. Prior to my treatment here I used to wear an RPD (denture). I had to visit this clinic because after several years of using the denture, it had broken - and I wanted to get a more permanent solution, a dental implant. After a couple of visits and scans (CBCT, etc) Dr. Amruta drew out a complete plan for me which involved some ortho, some laser surgery & finally a dental implant.
In other clinics I visited, they had similar plans but usually would only tackle the one problem (missing tooth). At Ivory Smiles, Dr. Amruta takes the time to make sure you feel good about your entire smile & she's very particular about the overall appearance of the teeth and her treatment plans are aligned with that (within reason).
We did not opt for Invisalign because it was a short treatment period & simple movements.
My ortho treatment was carried out for a period of 4-6 months by Dr. Anitha, the visiting orthodontist at the time, who is also really amazing. I was given a temporary bridge in that duration.
Post the ortho, the dental implant surgery itself was carried out very smoothly as this is Dr. Amruta's area of expertise - pain management was amazing & she talked me through the entire process. There were some minor gum correction laser treatments as well.

--

I am extremely happy with the final result of my treatment and my smile. Teeth are such an important part of your life which you don't realize how problematic their condition is until you see their effect on your life after they have undergone the right treatment.
In terms of pricing, I would say it is not the cheapest - but since this is a premium clinic you definitely get what you pay for.

Overall, to re-iterate I would unquestionably recommend anyone to choose Ivory Smiles! :)
reply_text: Thank you for my patience and trust in us. We are glad we could help you achieve what you have always wanted, a great smile !!!!
